articles.description: The Bluebirds were thrashed by the Swans during a disastrous South Wales derby on Saturday
articles.content:
Stop me if you think youve heard this one before.
Another South Wales derby has brought with it another impotent Cardiff performance and it was all too familiar. Cardiff fans have become accustomed … [+5369 chars]
